name: grouped-products
title: Grouped Products for WooCommerce
description: Groups products together for display on archive pages.

scripts.build-zip: npm run build && mkdir ./rapid-products-woocommerce && cp -r ./rapid-products-woocommerce.php ./rapid-products-woocommerce/rapid-products-woocommerce.php && cp -r ./includes ./rapid-products-woocommerce/includes && cp -r ./build ./rapid-products-woocommerce/build && zip -r ./rapid-products-woocommerce.zip ./rapid-products-woocommerce && rm -r ./rapid-products-woocommerce
